TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BoundColumn extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn

summary.span: 绑定到数据源中的字段的 控件的列类型。

span.span: A column type for the control that is bound to a field in a data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 控件中的列类型 可显示数据源中字段的内容。Use the column type in a control to display the contents of a field in the data source. 这些值列在单个列中。The values are listed in a single column. 此字段链接到 ，因此数据源中的任何更新都将反映在控件的相应单元格中 。The field is linked to the , so any updates in the data source will reflect in the corresponding cells of the control. > [!NOTE] > 此列类型是控件的默认值 。This column type is the default for the control. 若要控制此列的外观，请使用控件的样式属性 。To control appearance of this column, use the style properties of the control. > [!CAUTION] > 文本在中显示之前未经过 HTML 编码 。Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the . 这样就可以在文本的 HTML 标记中嵌入脚本。This makes it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text. 如果此列的值来自用户输入，请务必验证这些值以减少安全漏洞。If the values for this column come from user input, be sure to validate the values to reduce security vulnerabilities. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 在控件中使用列类型 来显示数据源中的字段。The following example demonstrates how to use a column type in the control to display the fields in a data source. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic BoundColumn Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BoundColumn Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic BoundColumn Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BoundColumn Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets the field name from the data source to bind to the .

value.span: 要绑定到 的字段名称。

span.span: The name of the field to bind to the .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定要绑定到的字段 。Use the property to specify the field to bind to the . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来指定数据源中要绑定到的字段的名称 。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the name of the field in the data source to bind to the . summary.span: 获取或设置指定列中各项的显示格式的字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that specifies the display format for items in the column.

value.span: 指定列中各项的显示格式的格式化字符串。

span.span: A formatting string that specifies the display format of items in the column.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性为列中的项提供自定义格式。Use the property to provide a custom format for the items in the column. 数据格式字符串由以冒号分隔的两部分组成，格式为 { `A` ： `Bxx` }。The data format string consists of two parts, separated by a colon, in the form { `A` : `Bxx` }. 例如，格式化字符串将 {0:F2} 显示具有两个小数位的定点数。For example, the formatting string {0:F2} displays a fixed-point number with two decimal places. > [!NOTE] > 整个字符串必须括在大括号中，以指示它是格式字符串而不是文本字符串。The entire string must be enclosed in braces to indicate that it is a format string and not a literal string. 大括号外的任何文本都显示为文本。Any text outside the braces is displayed as literal text. 常规示例中冒号 (前面的值 `A`) 在从零开始的参数列表中指定参数索引。The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the parameter index in a zero-based list of parameters. > [!NOTE] > 此值只能设置为0，因为每个单元格中只有一个值。This value can only be set to 0 because there is only one value in each cell. 常规示例中冒号后面的字符 (`B`) 指定显示值的格式。The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the format to display the value in. 下表列出了常见格式。The following table lists the common formats. |格式字符Format character|说明Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`C`|以货币格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in currency format.| |`D`|以十进制格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in decimal format.| |`E`|以科学 (指数) 格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|以固定格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in fixed format.| |`G`|以常规格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in general format.| |`N`|以数字格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in number format.| |`X`|以十六进制格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > 格式字符不区分大小写，但除外 `X` ，后者在指定的情况下显示十六进制字符。The format character is not case-sensitive, except for `X`, which displays the hexadecimal characters in the case specified. 常规示例中格式字符 (后面的值 `xx`) 指定要显示的有效位数或小数位数。The value after the format character (`xx` in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display. 有关设置字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types)。For more information on formatting strings, see [Formatting Types](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性为控件中的列指定各种格式 。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify various formats for the columns in the control. `Qty`列的格式为整数， `Price` 列的格式设置为货币，列的 `Weight` 格式为十进制数字，列的 `Expires` 格式为短日期和时间字符串。The `Qty` column is formatted as an integer, the `Price` column is formatted as currency, the `Weight` column is formatted as a decimal number, and the `Expires` column is formatted as a short date and time string. [!code-aspx-csharp[BoundColumnDataFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BoundColumnDataFormatString/cs/BoundColumnSampleCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BoundColumnDataFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BoundColumnDataFormatString/vb/BoundColumnSampleVB.aspx#1)]

returns.span: 已转换为由 属性指示的格式的指定值。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可将指定的值转换为属性指示的格式 。Use the method to convert the specified value to the format indicated by the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果未设置该属性，则此方法返回值的等效字符串 。This method returns the string equivalent of the value if the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定是否可以编辑中的项 。Use the property to specify whether the items in the can be edited. 此属性还可用于以编程方式确定列是否为只读。This property can also be used to programmatically determine whether the column is read-only. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性指定为 只读。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that a is read-only. .Aspx 文件定义三个 BoundColumn 控件，并将项列设置为只读。The .aspx file defines three BoundColumn controls, and sets the Item column to read-only. [!code-aspx-csharp[BoundColumnReadOnly#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BoundColumnReadOnly/CS/boundcolumnreadonlycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BoundColumnReadOnly#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BoundColumnReadOnly/VB/boundcolumnreadonlyvb.aspx#1)]
